courses.about: A comprehensive course designed for kids wanting to learn the core concepts of painting.
courses.TagLine: Unleash your inner artist make your world colorful!

courses.about: Students will learn unique choreographies and will be exposed to the concepts of expressions, rythm, beats, and mood through a variety of popular movie songs.
courses.TagLine: Learn to dance like a star on the Latest Bollywood Hits!

courses.about: These online keyboard classes have been crafted by expert instrumentalists to help your little one start their music journey with piano/keyboard!
courses.TagLine: Enter the world of Music and play magical tunes on Piano!

courses.about: By the end of the course students will build up a foundation for leaning English,learn over 200 most commonly used words and expressions and be able to speak about their family, pets, likes and dislikes.
courses.TagLine: Bring Brilliance in Speech and Strengthen your core!

courses.about: Pottery is a fun and educational activity ideal for kids,through this course you can teach children how to follow directions as well as to be creative and express themselves.
courses.TagLine: Mould your ideas with passion and love!

courses.about: A comprehensive course designed for kids wanting to learn the skills and technique of drumming.
courses.TagLine: Start drumming and make some noise!

courses.about: Through this course kids will learn the brain friendly mental math techniques about basic mathematical operation like addition and subtraction.
courses.TagLine: Unlock the secrets of numbers and be one step ahead always!

courses.about: This course gives kids exposure to different paper arts like origami,recycled paper art and clay modelling
A comprehensive course designed for kids wanting to learn the technicalities and intricacies of classical dance form BharatNatyam.
